body:
So I just spent the last 45 minutes or so spectating a couple hackers and trying to record them but my recorder's quality is pretty low, I'm currently using a program called SmartPixel, anyone got any suggestions or recommendations of any screen recorder that's free and the quality's higher than 30-50 fps?
I'm a bit frustrated as because I couldn't get some decent proof of these players in question and my connection started derping towards the end of the recording /:
at least I know one of the hackers has been dealt with by now but I haven't checked on his companion, thank you Emerald for taking care of him, I understand the servers are plagued with hackers now that Nodus has updated and it's really hard to keep up with them being such a reduced number of staff on vs the constantly increasing number of hackers, should I even bother to start a thread on the player reports with the footage I got of them? it is slooooowly uploading to photobucket as I write this
